 2003-05772003-04-30,  ,  INDUSTRY,  ,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of LOUIS J. DUHAMEL of Outremont, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
